title: Convert DWORD to Hexadecimal String
description: This function converts a DWORD (32-bit unsigned integer) into its equivalent hexadecimal string representation. The output string is of fixed length (8 characters) and represents the hexadecimal value of the input DWORD in reverse order.
name: DWORD_TO_STRH

input.name: IN
input.description: The input DWORD value that needs to be converted to a hexadecimal string.

return_value.description: A string representation of the hexadecimal value of the input DWORD, consisting of 8 hex characters.
